img_text: The HILLBILLY 1978 Limited Edition Collector's Item Commemorating America's Mountain Folk CONGRATULATIONSuon becomnng the oner of a Boker Tree Brand Limited Edition #1978 LTD Hillbilly Knife. The eighth in an Annual Imported Series commemorating America's Mountain Folk These Limited Edition Knives have been hond tooled by mas tercraftsmen ades have been created from a special chrome a nndium steel and boisters and pins are nickel sitver To add to the historical significance and authenticity of this Limited Edition, a registration certificateis packaged in each box Your knife has its own exclunive serial number Bv retuning the completed section below, this serial number can be officially registered at the head quarters of Boker Treo Brand Knives
